timeline.bodyText:
Is there any issue that it solves? Can you share more details in the commit message about it?
Do we need to stress test this?
timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText:
This no longer affects us, right?
Anyway, good to add something to commit message (worth mentioning whether this currently affects us or not).

Do we need to stress test this?

I think this may be a good idea, as we're pulling in more than one code change (are we?)
replies.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: I'll run that multiple times then
replies.author: wendigo

timeline.message:
Update testcontainers to version 1.15.1

This version includes fix for "docker-java-stream" thread stuck at UnixDomainSocket.recv():
https://github.com/docker-java/docker-java/pull/1476
